amendment.description: An amendment numbered 56 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to reduce the salary of Nejwa Ali, U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services Adjudication Officer, to $1.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Amodei amendment (A028) Agreed to by voice vote.
